Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN AR Adjustment Events in error GL Period not open - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN AR Adjustment Events in error GL Period not open - Weekly
Source.Description: Identified adjustment events in error with GL period not open.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_AR_ADJ_EVENTS_IN_ERROR_95325' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'USER_RESP:' || s.USER_RESP || ', ORG_ID:' || s.ORG_ID || ', ADJUSTMENT_NUMBER:' || s.ADJUSTMENT_NUMBER || ', ADJUSTMENT_ID:' || s.ADJUSTMENT_ID || ', GL_DATE:' || s.GL_DATE || ', ERROR_MESSAGE:' || s.ERROR_MESSAGE key_data FROM (select user_resp USER_RESP, org_id ORG_ID, adjustment_number ADJUSTMENT_NUMBER, adjustment_id ADJUSTMENT_ID, gl_date GL_DATE, error_message ERROR_MESSAGE from (select 'User Name=' || users.user_name || ', Responsibility ID=' || (SELECT min(responsibility_id) FROM apps.fnd_responsibility resp WHERE application_id = 222) user_resp, xlt.SECURITY_ID_INT_1 ORG_ID, xlt.transaction_number ADJUSTMENT_NUMBER, xlt.source_id_int_1 ADJUSTMENT_ID, trunc(xe.event_date) GL_DATE, xae.encoded_msg ERROR_MESSAGE from apps.xla_accounting_errors xae, apps.xla_transaction_entities_upg xlt, apps.xla_events xe, apps.fnd_user users where xe.created_by = users.user_id and xe.application_id = 222 and xae.application_id = 222 and xe.process_status_code = 'I' and xae.message_number = 95325 and xae.event_id = xe.event_id and xlt.entity_id = xe.entity_id and xlt.entity_code = 'ADJUSTMENTS' and xe.event_date between sysdate-365 and sysdate and rownum<= 5 ) ) s
